name: PIGSADILLA
description:
A video game made for #LudumDare45 in 48h.

PIGSADILLA is an horror game, where we have to find the key items to success. Our character have a very special phobia, and that phobia will follow him throw the whole game. Don't let him catch you (SPOILER: he´s bad). Once you picked up all the items, 6 in total, you have to do the satanic ritual and return to bed. Hopefully this time you'll have a nice dream.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left click - interact

Credits:

Jacinto de Alba (Instagram: @brutal.pig) - 3D artist & Illustrator

Juan Labrador Ariza - 3D artist & Texture Artist

Ignacio Pérez Mateo (Twitter: @naxvader) - Game Designer & Programmer

--------------------------

Music from https://filmmusic.io by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
